nodes.text: Battle in the Arena is a children's book released by Random House in October 2002, written by Justine and Ron Fontes. The cover price was $3.25.
The book adapts the First Battle of Geonosis from Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.

One of the most action-packed sequences in Attack of the Clones takes place in the Geonosian execution arena. Anakin Skywalker, Padmé Amidala and Obi-Wan Kenobi are attacked by a trio of vicious arena beasts, and must rely on their wits to survive. The surprise arrival of Jedi reinforcements leads to a chaotic battle between Jedi, battle droids, Geonosians and arena monsters. The excitement is captured in Battle in the Arena, a 24-page storybook by Justine and Ron Fontes.
